text: khaṇḍitavāgiyū, tam'ma baḷige (allāhana kaḍeyinda) yāvudē pramāṇa bandilladiddarū, allāhana vacanagaḷa viṣayadalli jagaḷāḍuvavara manas'sugaḷalli (tāvē māhānaremba) ahaṅkāra tumbide. Ādare, avarendū adannu (mahānateyannu) sādhisalāraru. Nīvu allāhana rakṣaṇeyannu kōriri. Avanu khaṇḍita ellavannū kēḷuvavanu hāgū nōḍuvavanāgiddāne
